# Optional Metadata
[Platform-Info]
Name: Apply Codes - The First Agentic AI Recruitment Platform
Description: The world's first Agentic AI recruitment platform leveraging MCP (Model Context Protocol), LLM orchestration, and autonomous AI agents for end-to-end talent operations. Pioneering AI ops and recruitment ops automation.
Category: Agentic AI, HR Technology, Recruitment Automation, AI Operations, MCP Platform
Primary-Features: Autonomous AI Agents, MCP-Powered Workflows, LLM Orchestration, Real-Time Interview AI, Multi-Agent Recruitment Ops, AI-Driven Talent Intelligence
Core-Technologies: MCP (Model Context Protocol), Gemini 2.0, WebSocket Architecture, Agentic AI Framework, LLM Pipeline, AI Operations Platform
Integration-Partners: Daily.co, Gemini AI, Nymeria, SendGrid, 20+ ATS platforms, MCP Servers
Target-Audience: AI-Forward Companies, Recruitment Operations Teams, Talent Ops Leaders, HR Tech Innovators, Enterprise Talent Acquisition
